thread.title: Here Is Samuel L. Jackson Being Forced to Give La La Land An Oscar
thread.title_full: Here Is Samuel L. Jackson Being Forced to Give La La Land An Oscar

author: Kara Brown
title: Here Is Samuel L. Jackson Being Forced to Give La La Land An Oscar

organizations.name: give la la land an oscar la la land

text:
La La Land won the Oscar for Best Original Song. The award was handed out by Samuel L. Jackson. He presented the statue to three white men who won an award for making jazz music. Advertisement 
For a refresher, this was Jackson’s response in a recent interview about this year’s Oscar-nominated films. 
Again, here was that moment. 
Dude, same.
